faqs.q: How many calories in a medium 7-Eleven Slurpee?
faqs.a: About 210 calories for a 16 fl oz medium Slurpee.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a 7 Eleven Slurpee?
faqs.a: Around 54 g carbs, all from sugars, in a medium serving.

faqs.q: Does Slurpee have fat or protein?
faqs.a: Typically 0 g fat and 0 g protein per serving.

faqs.q: How do calories change by Slurpee size?
faqs.a: Small (12 oz) ≈158 kcal; large (32 oz) ≈420 kcal; scales with volume.
